extension.description:
A css3 and jQuery animated skillset graph.

Based on the script by W3 LEssons and brought to you by Joomlabamboo.

field.name: display
field.label: Display
field.description: Determines whether the output of the module is in a line graph or counts through numbers.

field.name: jquery-load
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: When enabled the module triggers the jQuery behaviour in Joomla 3 and loads an instance of the jQuery library in Joomla 2.5. You need to have jQuery loaded on the page once in your template so if you already have this then ensure this option is disabled. If using Joomla3 and your template or another extension has already called this behaviour this setting will have no effect.

field.name: css-load
field.label: Load CSS?
field.description: When enabled the module loads a small css file with the styling required for the module. If you want to cut down on css fiels loaded on your site then you can disable this option and copy the contents of the /mod_skillset/css/skillset.css file into your template.

field.name: circle_diameter
field.label: Circle Diameter
field.description: Defines the diameter of the circle

field.name: circle_thickness
field.label: Circle Thickness
field.description: Defines the width of the circle

field.name: circle_fontsize
field.label: Circle Font Size
field.description: Defines the fontsize for the % shown in the circle.

field.name: circle_color
field.label: Circle Color
field.description: Select the colour used for circle layout.

field.name: circle_fill
field.label: Circle Background Color
field.description: Select the background colour used for circle layout.
